actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to require the Internal Revenue Service to audit all income tax returns made by Members of Congress.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require the Internal Revenue Service to audit all income tax returns filed by members of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to require the Internal Revenue Service to audit all income tax returns made by Members of Congress.
